defs: the state of being an idiot; foolishness; idiocy; stupidity.
cooked rice offered in a sacrifice to a deity.
a rite of offering cooked rice to a deity.
loud or confused shouting; din of voices; clamour.
the low, continuous murmuring or humming sound of a bee.
= ಗಾವರಿಸು.
any of a number of related large, hairy, yellow-and-black social bees of Bombus genus that make a loud hum; a bumble-bee.
a rustic taste.
to make loud or confused shouting; to cry out noisily; to clamour.
to make a low, continuous, murmuring sound like that of a bee; to hum.
the deciduous tree Careya arborea of Lecythidaceae family, usu. of medium size with obovate leaves.
a dog (either tamed or stray, but living in a human habitat as opp. to the wild one's).
the state of being somewhat dark; dimness.
a large mass of water vapour condensed to fine particles, at or just above the earth's surface; thick, obscuring mist; fog.
a similar mass of smoke, dust, etc. obscuring the atmosphere.
loud or confused shouting; din of voices; clamour.
a disturbed condition.
a large number of persons or things gathered together; a multitude; a crowd.
an annoying or being annoyed; annoyance; a trouble.
a style or manner, either natural or affected, characteristic of a person.
a man who makes uproar or tumult.
a man of no rank or status; a common man.
= ಗಾವಳಿಸು.
to gather at a place; to come together in a large number.
the wife of the chief of a village.
a man who lives in a village; a villager.
the chief or a man in charge of the administration, of a village.
a town-watchman.
a man regarded as unsophisticated, unintelligent, stupid, etc.
lack of normal intelligence; foolishness; stupidity.

stupid words or speech.
a foolish woman.

a sacrificing of a sheep or goat by tearing it with teeth (by the priest).
ಗಾವಿನ ಮರಿ gāvina mari a sheep or goat selected for sacrificing; ಗಾವು ಕಟ್ಟು gāvu kaṭṭu to sacrifice a sheep or goat in such a manner; ಗಾವು ಸಿಗಿ gāvu sigi to tear the sacrificial victim with the teeth.
the chief of a village.
the office or status the chief of a village.
the duty of the chief of a village.
the share in the revenue of a village which the chief of that village gets.
the wife of the chief of a village.
a female servant.
the office, status, duty etc. of the chief of a village.
to assume the office , responsibility of the head of a village.
the chief of a village.
the duty, office or status of the chief of a village.
(the chief of a village) to exercise authority over or rule, administer a village.
a sheep selected for being sacrificed by tearing it with the teeth by the priest.

the plant Cordia macleodii of Boraginaceae family.
a measure of distance approx. equal to 10 kilometres (according to some, it is 16.6 to 20 Kms.).
lacking wisdom; unintelligent.
a stupid, slow-witted person.

= ಗಾವುಗುರಿ.
= ಗಾವಳಿ.
a more or less concentrated group of houses, larger than a village but smaller than a city; a town.
a bag filled with something and usu. tied or stitched.
a number of things tied in or wrapped with cloth.
a state of mental distress; worry.
a being meddled, annoyed or irritatingly interfered by (another).
physical or mental exhaustion; weariness; fatigue.
a decorated cloth used as a covering over the saddle.
a thin cover, veil.

= ಗಾಸಿಗೊಳಿಸು.
to trouble; to annoy; to cause irritation by repeated interference.
to cause to become weary.
to be annoyed, troubled.
to become weary.

= ಗಾಸಿಗೊಳ್ಳು.
a unsewn, oblong cloth worn by men around the waiste to cover the lower parts and one end of which is taken between the legs and tucked behind at the waist band; a dhōti.
an oblong, unsewn cloth, as a towel, used to tie around the waiste.
the act or fact of going under the surface of a liquid; a being immersed.
a hiding of oneself.
the quality or condition of being deep; deepness.
an incomprehensible subject, matter, secret, etc.; a mysterious thing.
a deep ditch.
a dense, impenetrable forest.
a person who habitually cheats others.
the act or an instance of disappearing, hiding (oneself); ಗಾಹಿಲಾಗು gahilāgu to cease to be seen; to go out of sight; to disappear.
to cover (the area with); to pervade.
to go under the surface of a liquid.
to laugh at in contempt or scorn; to make fun of; to ridicule.
to deal with dishonestly for one's own gain; to defraud.
to deceive by trickery; to fool; to cheat.
the quality or condition of being deep; deepness.
intensity, as of silence, emotion, etc.
profundity of thought; intellectual depth.
great ability or proficiency; expertness that comes from training, practice, etc.; skill.
an act of cheating; deceit; trickery.
an object or end that one strives to attain; an aim.
a narrow, usu. dark, path to escape secretly.
a man of profound knowledge.
the act or habit of cheating (others).
a false idea or conception; belief or opinion not in accord with the facts.

a seasoned cheat.
a female cheater.
to know the depth of; to explore, investigate or examine with thoroughness; to probe.
a quick motion; swiftness; an acting or moving with great force; vehemence.
a short pithy saying in general use, held to embody a general truth or popularly accepted as a truth; a proverb; an adage.
a piece of music sung or composed for singing; a song.
a poetical composition; a poem or verse.
a bent piece of wire, usu. barbed and baited, for catching fish; a fish-hook.
(fig.) anything used as a lure; an enticement.
(fig.) a tricky method for achieving a purpose; an angle.
a clever, ingenious man.
a long stick to which a fish-hook is attached.
a man who catches fish using a fish-hook.
the act of separating solid particles, impurities, etc. from a liquid passing it through a porous substance; filtering.
to fish with a hook and line; to angle.
(fig.) to attract by offering hope of reward or pleasure; to lure; to entice.
to become ruined or useless.
the elastic, invisible mixture of gases (chiefly nitrogen and oxygen, as well as hydrogen, carbon dioxide, argon, neon, helium, etc.) that surrounds the earth, either in motion or not; air; wind.
the supposed disembodied spirit of a dead person (esp. a pregnant woman), conceived of as appearing to the living as a pale, shadowy apparition; a ghost.
any clue by which something is followed or detected.
the state of the mind being agitated, perturbed greatly.
the power of a person who affects another, as seen in the action, style etc. of the latter.

the trend of affairs or public opinion; ಗಾಳಿ ಊದು gāḷi ūdu = ಗಾಳಿ ಹಾಕು; ಗಾಳಿಗೆ ತೂರು gāḷige tūru (fig.) to neglect or avoid following principles, advice, rules etc., for getting benefits in the short run; ಗಾಳಿಗೊಡ್ಡಿದ ಸೊಡರು(ಲು) gāḷigoḍḍida soḍaru(lu) anything that is subject to destruction by an impending or inevitable danger.

that which is not lasting; temporal; transitory; ಗಾಳಿ ಬಂದಲ್ಲಿ ಕೊಡೆ ಹಿಡಿ gāḷi bandalli koḍe hiḍi (prov.) to act to take advantage of the situation; ಗಾಳಿ ಬಂದಾಗ ತೂರಿಕೊ gāḷi bandāga tūriko (prov.) to utilise a favourable opportunity to the fullest possible extent; to hoist your sail when the wind is fair; to make the hay while the sun shines; ಗಾಳಿಯ ವಾದ್ಯ gāḷiya vādya (n .) (often wrongly used as gāḷivādya) a musical instrument sounded by blowing air through it, as a flute, pipe, etc.
insulting speech; abuse; rebuke.
a snake, that is supposed to live on air (without food).
a man not taking any food.
(fig.) a malignant, spiteful man.
a cloth contrivance usu. shaped like an umbrella when expanded, and used to retard the falling speed of a person or thing dropping from an airplane, etc. a parachute.
a cavity or compartment full of air, used in hydraulics to equalise the flow of a fluid; an air-chamber.
a gun operated by means of compressed air; an air-gun.
a device in the shape of a rooster, set up high to swing with the wind and show which way it is blowing; a weather vane; a weather-cock.
a ghost, spirit, which moves in the air.
a corrupt form ಗಾಳಿಗಂಟು.
an act or work that is impracticable to achieve.
(fig.) a condition that is annoying in many ways resolving of which is difficult.
a mill operated by the wind's rotation of large, oblique sails or vanes radiating from a shaft: used as a source of power for grinding grain, pumping water, generating electricity, etc; a wind-mill.
a deer, as the vehicle of the Wind-God.

(fig.) to engage oneself in an impracticable work; to waste one's efforts knowingly; to beat the air; ಗಾಳಿಗುದ್ದಿ ಮೈ ನೋಯಿಸಿಕೊ gāḷi guddi mai nōyisiko (prov.) to attempt something that is impracticable or useless; to kick the bricks.
(anat. zool.) a small cavity or hollow, as a cell of a honeycomb, air cell of a lung, tooth socket, etc.; an alveolus.

to abstain from all foods; to eat nothing; to be on fast.
to become wild as the one being possessed (by an evil spirit).

an airtight bag that rises and floats above the earth when filled with air (sometime with hot air or a gas lighter than air, such as hydrogen or helium; a balloon.
purified; filtered; sifted.
to fill (something) with air.
(fig.) to encourage.
(fig.) to exaggerate, overstate or overemphasise.
(myth.) a chariot, vehicle that moves in the sky.

its fruit.

to influence (to form or change public opinion).

a bag or bulb in to fill the air with.

any deity, who moves in the sky.
